languages.text: "Вот она, настоящая ряженная — дворовая девка Ренка! Она сама призналась в этом Звездн{mf|ому|ой} Госпо{mf|дину|же}!" {n}— выплевывает старик и указывает пальцем на испуганно сжавшуюся Ренку.{/n} "Как только вам, лицемеры, пришла в голову мысль обмануть наш{mf|его|у} высш{mf|его|ую} благодетел{mf|я|ьницу}?!"

"Here she is, the real impostor, the house girl Renka! She admitted it herself to the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}the old man spits and points his finger at Renka, who shrinks away in fear.{/n} "How could you schemers even think of deceiving our supreme benefactor?"
languages.original_text: "Вот она, настоящая ряженная — дворовая девка Ренка! Она сама призналась в этом Звездн{mf|ому|ой} Госпо{mf|дину|же}!" {n}— выплевывает старик и указывает пальцем на испуганно сжавшуюся Ренку.{/n} "Как только вам, лицемеры, пришла в голову мысль обмануть наш{mf|его|у} высш{mf|его|ую} благодетел{mf|я|ьницу}?!"

traits.locale_text: "Here she is, the real impostor, the house girl Renka! She admitted it herself to the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}the old man spits and points his finger at Renka, who shrinks away in fear.{/n} "How could you impostors even think of deceiving our supreme benefactor?"

"There is your impostor! Renka the house girl! She has confessed!" {n}he suddenly spits out, pointing his finger at the shivering Renka.{/n} "These fools have tried to deceive you, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}The man backs away, leaving Renka in the centre of the circle.{/n}

"Here she is, the real impostor, the house girl Renka! She admitted it herself to the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}the old man spits and points his finger at Renka, who shrinks away in fear.{/n} "How could you impostors even think of deceiving our supreme benefactor?"

"There is your impostor! Renka the house girl! She has just confessed!" {n}he suddenly spits out, pointing his finger at the shivering Renka.{/n} "These fools have tried to deceive you, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}The man backs away, leaving Renka in the centre of the circle.{/n}

"Here she is, the real impostor, the house girl Renka! She admitted it herself to the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}the old man spits and points his finger at Renka, who shrinks away in fear.{/n} "How could you schemers even think of deceiving our supreme benefactor?"

"Here she is, the real impostor, the house girl Renka! She admitted it herself to the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}the old man spits and points his finger at Renka, who shrinks away in fear.{/n} "How could you schemers even think of deceiving our supreme benefactor?"

"Here she is, the real impostor, the house girl Renka! She admitted it herself to the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}the old man spits and points his finger at Renka, who shrinks away in fear.{/n} "How could you impostors even think of deceiving our supreme benefactor?"

languages.text: “是她！她才是真正的冒牌货，她是我的女佣莲卡！她刚刚亲口承认了，来自上界的大人！”{n}老人朝地上啐了一口，用手指着瑟瑟发抖的莲卡。{/n}“你们这群阴谋分子！真以为能瞒得过来自上界的大人吗？”
languages.original_text: "Here she is, the real impostor, the house girl Renka! She admitted it herself to the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}the old man spits and points his finger at Renka, who shrinks away in fear.{/n} "How could you schemers even think of deceiving our supreme benefactor?"

traits.locale_text: “是她！她才是真正的冒牌货，她是我的女佣莲卡！她刚刚亲口承认了，来自上界的大人！”{n}老人朝地上啐了一口，用手指着瑟瑟发抖的莲卡。{/n}“你们这群阴谋分子！真以为能瞒得过来自上界的大人吗？”
“是她！她才是真正的冒牌货，她是我的女佣莲卡！她刚刚亲口承认了，来自上界的大人！”{n}老人朝地上啐了一口，用手指着瑟瑟发抖的莲卡。{/n}“你们这群冒牌货！真以为能瞒得过来自上界的大人吗？”

languages.text: 「彼女はここにいます。真の偽物、使用人のレンカです！天の{mf|君|姫}に自分から白状しました！」{n}老人は唾を吐き捨て、恐怖に縮み上がるレンカを指差した。{/n}「どうしてお前ら策士どもは、我らが至高の恩恵者を騙そうなどと考えられるんだ？」
languages.original_text: "Here she is, the real impostor, the house girl Renka! She admitted it herself to the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}the old man spits and points his finger at Renka, who shrinks away in fear.{/n} "How could you schemers even think of deceiving our supreme benefactor?"

traits.locale_text: 「彼女はここにいます。真の偽物、使用人のレンカです！天の{mf|君|姫}に自分から白状しました！」{n}老人は唾を吐き捨て、恐怖に縮み上がるレンカを指差した。{/n}「どうしてお前ら策士どもは、我らが至高の恩恵者を騙そうなどと考えられるんだ？」

languages.text: «¡He aquí a la verdadera impostora, la doncella Renka! ¡Ella misma lo ha admitido ante {mf|el Señor|la Señora} Celestial!», {n}espeta el anciano señalando con el dedo a Renka, que se encoge de miedo.{/n} «¿Cómo se os ocurre siquiera tratar de engañar a {mf|nuestro supremo benefactor|nuestra suprema benefactora}?».
languages.original_text: "Here she is, the real impostor, the house girl Renka! She admitted it herself to the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}the old man spits and points his finger at Renka, who shrinks away in fear.{/n} "How could you schemers even think of deceiving our supreme benefactor?"

traits.locale_text: «¡He aquí a la verdadera impostora, la doncella Renka! ¡Ella misma lo ha admitido ante {mf|el Señor|la Señora} Celestial!», {n}espeta el anciano señalando con el dedo a Renka, que se encoge de miedo.{/n} «¿Cómo se os ocurre siquiera tratar de engañar a {mf|nuestro supremo benefactor|nuestra suprema benefactora}?».

languages.text: "İşte gerçek taklitçimiz! Hane kızı Renka! Semavi {mf|Lordumuza|Leydimize} itirafta bulundu!" {n}Yaşlı adam tükürüyor ve parmağını, korkudan büzülen Renka'ya doğrultuyor.{/n} "Entrikacılar! Böylesine yüce bir hayırseveri nasıl aldatırsınız?"
languages.original_text: "Here she is, the real impostor, the house girl Renka! She admitted it herself to the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}the old man spits and points his finger at Renka, who shrinks away in fear.{/n} "How could you schemers even think of deceiving our supreme benefactor?"

traits.locale_text: "İşte gerçek taklitçimiz! Hane kızı Renka! Semavi {mf|Lordumuza|Leydimize} itirafta bulundu!" {n}Yaşlı adam tükürüyor ve parmağını, korkudan büzülen Renka'ya doğrultuyor.{/n} "Entrikacılar! Böylesine yüce bir hayırseveri nasıl aldatırsınız?"

languages.text: « La voilà, la véritable impostrice : la servante Renka ! Elle l'a avoué d'elle-même à sa Céleste Seigneurie ! » {n}crache le vieil homme en pointant du doigt une Renka tremblante.{/n} « Bande de comploteurs, comment osez-vous chercher à tromper notre {mf|bienfaiteur|bienfaitrice} suprême ? »
languages.original_text: "Here she is, the real impostor, the house girl Renka! She admitted it herself to the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}the old man spits and points his finger at Renka, who shrinks away in fear.{/n} "How could you schemers even think of deceiving our supreme benefactor?"

traits.locale_text: « La voilà, la véritable impostrice : la servante Renka ! Elle l'a avoué d'elle-même à sa Céleste Seigneurie ! » {n}crache le vieil homme en pointant du doigt une Renka tremblante.{/n} « Bande de comploteurs, comment osez-vous chercher à tromper notre {mf|bienfaiteur|bienfaitrice} suprême ? »

languages.text: "Das hier ist die wahre Hochstaplerin: das Hausmädchen Renka! Sie hat es vor {mf|dem himmlischen Herren|der himmlischen Herrin} selbst zugegeben!" {n}Der alte Mann spuckt aus und deutet auf Renka, die sich verängstigt zusammenkauert.{/n} "Wie konntet Ihr Intriganten nur daran denken, {mf|unseren obersten Wohltäter|unsere oberste Wohltäterin} zu täuschen?"
languages.original_text: "Here she is, the real impostor, the house girl Renka! She admitted it herself to the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}the old man spits and points his finger at Renka, who shrinks away in fear.{/n} "How could you schemers even think of deceiving our supreme benefactor?"

traits.locale_text: "Das hier ist die wahre Hochstaplerin: das Hausmädchen Renka! Sie hat es vor {mf|dem himmlischen Herren|der himmlischen Herrin} selbst zugegeben!" {n}Der alte Mann spuckt aus und deutet auf Renka, die sich verängstigt zusammenkauert.{/n} "Wie konntet Ihr Intriganten nur daran denken, {mf|unseren obersten Wohltäter|unsere oberste Wohltäterin} zu täuschen?"
